product_name: White Sierra Bug Free Jersey T-Shirt - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Hiking, camping or traveling in mosquito-prone areas? The women's cotton/polyester Bug Free Jersey T-Shirt from White Sierra uses Insect Shield(R) technology to repel pesky biters. Insect Shield clothing repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant; it's odorless and invisible. Long-sleeve White Sierra Bug Free Jersey T-Shirt also offers UVA/UVB sun protection and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable. Bug repellancy is effective through 70 washes. Special buy.
short_description: Hiking, camping or traveling in mosquito-prone areas? The women's cotton/polyester Bug Free Jersey T-Shirt from White Sierra uses Insect Shield(R) technology to repel pesky biters.
